SendCodeVoice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendCodeVoice
<公共请求参数>

{
  "CodeMessage": "1234",
  "PlayTimes": 2,
  "CalledNumber": "+8613788888888",
  "SessionContext": "test",
  "VoiceSdkAppid": "1400006666"
}
SendCodeVoice.title: 发送语音验证码

SendTtsVoice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendTtsVoice
<公共请求参数>

{

  "TemplateParamSet": ["7652"],
  "PlayTimes": 2,

  "VoiceSdkAppid": "1400006666"
}
SendTtsVoice.title: 指定模板发送语音通知
